resources.string: Short and delicate vibration. Allows you to warm up and relax in front of real fun. A good option to start a pleasant evening :)

Second level. Longer and more interesting vibration with an arrhythmic pattern. Perhaps the most important thing is to get a pleasant sensation without busting vibration. Let the evening get hotter :)
Third level. Maximum, almost continuous vibration. For those who do not compromise and want to reach the peak of sensations as soon as possible. Well, a good choice, but take care of the battery :)
